channel.title: [317] [Delta] Teleport in NPC dialogue

item.title: [317] [Delta] Teleport in NPC dialogue
item.dc:creator: @Saletana Saletana
item.description:
@Saletana wrote:

Source + Client 317 Delta Blindscape

So, I’m talking to an NPC and I want it to teleport me to certain coords while talking, but I want the teleport after I click on “Click here to continue” not directly when I click on the NPC… is there any way to do this?
Here’s what I got

if(NPCID == 2 && playerRights == 3){
                     talk2("You are going to be teleported into the administration zone", 2);
                     NpcDialogueSend = true;
				toX = 3020;
				toY = 2050;
				sM("Welcome to the administration zone");
}

It works fine, it just teles me instantly, I would like it to tele me when I click “Click here to continue”

Any help? Thanks

Read full topic
